name: Accept the Challenge?
description:
This game is for the entire world, especially for the bored.

Take on the Challenge and share your best time with the world!

To beat the game, you'll have to press any button on your keyboard or your mouse.

The rules are easy:

You can do the challenge with ANY method.

What works is accepted!

This is the easy version - "play" the full version (about many hours) here.

Share your best time in the comment section with a screenshot proof of your time!
